about_the_game:
The characters from the computer-animated TV show "PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures" have invaded PAC-MAN Championship Edition DX+ in a reckless celebration of the show's debut! Play using the characters and visuals from the show and transport all your courses into the world of "PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures"! Characters from the show even appear in visuals.
Add-on included in the All You Can Eat Add-on Pack and Edition.
detailed_description:
The characters from the computer-animated TV show "PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures" have invaded PAC-MAN Championship Edition DX+ in a reckless celebration of the show's debut! Play using the characters and visuals from the show and transport all your courses into the world of "PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures"! Characters from the show even appear in visuals.
Add-on included in the All You Can Eat Add-on Pack and Edition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit (x64) processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device

Play using the characters and visuals from the show and transport all your courses into the world of "PAC-MAN and the Ghostly Adventures"!
